title: PHPdeg2rad()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPdeg2rad()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example Convert degrees to radians: "; echo deg2rad("90") . "
"; echo deg2rad("360"); ?> Definition and Usage The deg2rad() function converts a degree value to a radian value. Tip: To convert a radian value to a degree value, look at the rad2deg() function. Syntax deg2rad( number ); Parameter Values Parameter Description number Required. Specifies the degree to convert Technical Details Return Value: The radian equivalent of number Return Type: Float PHP Version: 4+ More Examples Example Convert a degree into its radian equivalent: ★ +1

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code:
<?php
$deg = 180;
$rad = deg2rad($deg);
echo "$deg degrees is equal to $rad radians.";
?>
